Home.name: Daniel Cruz Arciniega
Home.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
Home.summary: Software Engineer with experience in full stack development, cloud infrastructure, and real-time server monitoring. Proven skills developing and deploying web and mobile applications. Passionate about operational excellence, security, reliability and performance efficiency. Soft skills including communication, adaptability, problem-solving, and teamwork.

experienceList.title: Full Stack Developer
experienceList.description: Build and optimize backend services with Django, focusing on query performance and scalability. Automate unit tests. Develop and maintain mobile applications. Collaborate in a team environment using Git for version control and code collaboration. Participate in code reviews, feature planning, and continuous improvement of development workflows.

experienceList.title: Data Analyst
experienceList.description: Optimize Elasticsearch queries to retrieve real-time server metrics. Create and maintain dashboards in Kibana for monitoring system performance and anomaly detection. Collaborated with operations and data teams to enhance monitoring infrastructure using the ELK stack, supporting continuous delivery and incident response workflows.

experienceList.title: Full Stack Developer
experienceList.description: Delivered tailored software solutions for different clients including NDS and Club.

educationList.institution: Monterrey Institute of Technology and Higher Education (ITESM)
educationList.extras: Concentration in Data Analytics and Machine Learning Tools

projectsList.name: ChambApp - Job Platform
projectsList.description: Mobile application for job searching in New York

projectsList.name: Country Club Reservations System
projectsList.description: Reservation management system which included a web application for staff and a mobile application for members of a country club.  The mobile application allowed members to track their golf handicap by registering shots without needing internet connection.

projectsList.name: AI Chatbot API Project
projectsList.description: Node API  to have a friendly conversation with an AI mimicking human conversation skills. The conversation was stored in a vector database so that the model only has to process the most relevant part of the conversation instead of the entire conversation. The model was trained using Python.

projectsList.name: Car E-commerce
projectsList.description: Car e-commerce platform. The project was divided into 4 micro-services (users, dealers, cars & sales).

projectsList.name: AI dog image classification project
projectsList.description: AI model to classify a dog’s breed given an image.

Map.title: Global Site Visitors
Map.description: A 3D representation of the locations from which visitors have accessed this portfolio website. Move around using the mouse or touch controls to explore the globe.
